paper_abstract: This paper links joint 2D-angle and frequency estimation problem to the trilinear model, and derives a novel blind joint angle and frequency estimation algorithm, which can be considered as a generalization of ESPRIT and has wider application than ESPRIT. The proposed algorithm supports small sample sizes and also has better performance than joint approximate diagonalization (JADE) method. Simulation results Verify its useful behavior.
paper_title: BLIND JOINT ANGLE AND FREQUENCY ESTIMATION WITH ANTENNA ARRAY
